ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model
Class TaskFilter

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.TaskFilter

public class TaskFilter
extends java.lang.Object

Filters tasks based on a set of Requirement.contentType. enum values.

Constructor Summary

          Initializes a new, empty TaskFilter.
TaskFilter(java.util.HashSet<Requirement.contentType> activeFilters)
          Initializes a new TaskFilter, given a set of active filters.
 
Method Summary
 void activateAll()
          Activates all possible filter types (according to Requirement.contentType).
 void activateFilter(Requirement.contentType requirementType)
          Activates the specified filter.
 void deactivateFilter(Requirement.contentType requirementType)
          Deactivates the specified filter.
 boolean isVisible(Task task)
          Checks the task against the filter and determines whether it should be displayed.

Checks the task against the filter and determines whether it should be displayed.

Parameters:

Returns:

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
